# tf.contrib.layers.summarize_tensors

### `tf.contrib.layers.summarize_tensors`

``` python
summarize_tensors(
    tensors,
    summarizer=tf.contrib.layers.summarize_tensor
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/summaries.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/summaries.py).

See the guide: [Layers (contrib) > Summaries](../../../../../api_guides/python/contrib.layers#Summaries)

Summarize a set of tensors.
